name: Advance Administration
description: You can issue forex advance, topup(reload),record the returned amount and perform regular audit/maintenance with respect advance administration.

name: Payment Batch
description: Approved and processed expense reports can be batched up together as payment batch. The batch file will be generated on closure of a batch.

name: Budget Administration
description: Budget Administration helps finance managers and admins in creating budget. The available budget can be blocked and consumed by the downstream applications such as Travel & Expense.

name: Card Administration
description: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
